pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build mechanical and structural projects such as a 2-Speed Car, Inchworm, and Rack and Pinion Steering car. Then learn about programming concepts such as software design, conditional statements, and loops while building robots with the EV3 system! Engineering and Robotics come together in this new full-day camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Robotics using LEGO® EV3: FULL DAY
